Instance.description: An interaction that displays a picker of BucksPerks and adds or removes from the sim the BuckPerk that is selected.

TunableEnum.name: bucks_type
TunableEnum.description: The type of Bucks required to unlock/lock this perk.

TunableList.name: continuations
TunableList.description: List of continuations to push if a buff is actually selected.

TunableEnum.name: actor
TunableEnum.description: The Sim on which the affordance is pushed.

Tunable.name: affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance to push as a continuation on the specified actor Sim.

TunableVariant.name: carry_target
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify a carry target for this continuation.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The participant the affordance will set as a carry target.

TunableVariant.name: inventory_carry_target
TunableVariant.description: Item in inventory (of continuations actor) to use as carry target for continuation if carry target is None

Tunable.name: definition
Tunable.description: The base definition to look for inside inventory. Objects that redirect (like counters) will match if base definition is the same.

Tunable.name: definition
Tunable.description: The exact object definition to look for inside inventory.

TunableTuple.name: object_with_tag
TunableTuple.description: This option tests crafted item's tags against a list of possible tags

TunableList.name: tag_set
TunableList.description: The tag of objects we want to test ownership of

TunableEnum.name: test_type
TunableEnum.description: How to test the tags in the tag set against the objects on the lot.

Tunable.name: preserve_preferred_object
Tunable.description: If checked, the pushed interaction's preferred objects are determined by the current preferred objects. If unchecked, the transition sequence would not award bonuses to any specific part.

Tunable.name: preserve_target_part
Tunable.description: If checked, the pushed interaction will use the same target part if applicable. Defaults to false because typically we will want to let the transition select which part to use.

Tunable.name: si_affordance_override
Tunable.description: When the tuned affordance is a mixer for a different SI, use this to specify the mixer's appropriate SI. This is useful for pushing socials.

TunableEnum.name: target
TunableEnum.description: The participant the affordance will target.

Tunable.name: is_add
Tunable.description: If this interaction is trying to add a bucks perk to the sim or to remove a bucks perk from the sim.

TunableEnum.name: subject
TunableEnum.description: From whom the BucksPerks should be added/removed.
